fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Members with Events but No Courses
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to find members based on existence in one domain but not another (set logic).

InputDefinition.userMessage: Find all members who have attended at least one event but have never enrolled in a course. Show me a table with their names and the number of events they've attended. I want to click on a member to see which specific events they attended.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes a table of members matching the criteria
Only members with event attendance are shown
No members in the list have any course enrollments
Event attendance count is shown for each member
Clicking member shows list of events they attended
Event table allows opening individual event records
